targets.rawSql:
select time, mast.state 
from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach
on mach.id = mast.machine_id
where mach.description = '${maquina}' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '20 seconds' AND NOW()
order by time desc

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(time, '1h'), 
  sum(mada.value) as "Quantidade por hora" 
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mada.sensor_type = '01' and mach.description = '${maquina}' 
and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '12 HOURS' AND NOW()
-- $__timeFilter("time") and 
GROUP by 1
ORDER BY time asc
limit 13

SELECT time, extra_data ->> 'nrOp' as "Número da ordem de produção"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '$maquina' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time desc

/*SELECT time, extra_data ->> 'artigo' as "Artigo"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '${maquina}' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '10 minutes' AND NOW()
order by time asc*/

/*SELECT time, extra_data ->> 'artigo' as "Artigo"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '${maquina}' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '10 minutes' AND NOW()
order by time asc*/

SELECT extra_data ->> 'artigo' as "Artigo"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '${maquina}' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time asc
limit 1

select time, sum(value) as "Contagem de peles"
from machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '$maquina'
and mada.sensor_type = '01'
and $__timeFilter(time)
group by 1

SELECT time, extra_data ->> 'nmCliente' as "Cliente"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '${maquina}' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time desc

SELECT mada.time, mada.extra_data ->> 'nmEventoParada' as "Descrição Evento Parada"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '${maquina}' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '24 s' AND NOW()
order by time asc

select (select
SUM (duration) 
from machines_state ms
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '$maquina' and state in ('5','4') and $__timeFilter(time) and duration < 60
group by machine_id) as UpTime,
(select 
SUM (duration) 
from machines_state ms
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '$maquina' and $__timeFilter(time) and duration < 60
group by machine_id) as AllTime from machines_state ms2 
group by 1

SELECT time, extra_data ->> 'espessuraFinal' as "Espessura Final"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '${maquina}' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time desc

SELECT time, extra_data ->> 'cor' as "Cor"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '${maquina}' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time desc

select (select
SUM (duration)  
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '$maquina' and state in ('5') and $__timeFilter(time) and ms.duration <30
group by machine_id) as "Running with P.O",
(select
SUM (duration) 
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '$maquina' and state in ('4') and $__timeFilter(time) and ms.duration <30
group by machine_id) as "Running without P.O",
(select
SUM (duration)  
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '$maquina' and state in ('3') and $__timeFilter(time) and ms.duration <31
group by machine_id) as "Stopped machine",
(select
SUM (duration)  
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '$maquina' and state in ('2') and $__timeFilter(time) and ms.duration <31
group by machine_id) as "Idle machine",
(select
SUM (duration)  
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '$maquina' and state in ('1','0') and $__timeFilter(time) and ms.duration <31
group by machine_id) as "Offline",
(select 
SUM (duration) 
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '$maquina' and $__timeFilter(time) and ms.duration <31
group by machine_id) as "Total time" from machines_state ms2 
group by 1

select time, mast.state 
from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach
on mach.id = mast.machine_id
where $__timeFilter(time) and mach.description = '$maquina'  
--where mach.description = '$maquina' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '7d' AND NOW()
order by time desc

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(time, '1h'), 
  sum(mada.value) as "Hide count" 
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mada.sensor_type = '01' and mach.description = '$maquina' 
and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '12 HOURS' AND NOW()
and $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP by 1
ORDER BY time desc

select time,
extra_data ->> 'nrOp' as "P.O",
extra_data ->> 'cor' as "Color",
extra_data ->> 'nmEventoParada' as "Stop"
from machines_data md 
inner join machines mach on md.machine_id = mach.id
where $__timeFilter(time) and mach.description = '$maquina' 
order by time asc

/*select mast.time,
mada.extra_data ->> 'nrOp' as "OP",
mada.extra_data ->> 'nmCliente' as "Cliente",
mada.extra_data ->> 'artigo' as "Artigo",
mada.extra_data ->> 'nmEventoParada' as "Paradas"
from machines_state mast
inner join machines_data mada on mada.machine_id = mast.machine_id
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where $__timeFilter(mast.time) and mach.description = '$maquina' 
order by mast.time desc*/

select time, value as "qtdTinta"
from machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '$maquina'
and mada.sensor_type = '09'  -- and time between now() - INTERVAL '1 m' AND NOW() 
and $__timeFilter(time)
limit 1
--GROUP BY mada.time , mada.value

select time, value as "Speed"
from machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '$maquina'
and mada.sensor_type = '09' --and sensor_id = 60
and $__timeFilter(time)
order by time desc
--GROUP BY mada.time , mada.value

select time, value as "qtdTinta"
from machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '$maquina'
and mada.sensor_type = '02'  -- and time between now() - INTERVAL '1 m' AND NOW() 
and $__timeFilter(time)
limit 1
--GROUP BY mada.time , mada.value

select time, value as "Tunel temperature"
from machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '$maquina'
and mada.sensor_type = '02' -- colocar sensor id da vel de carrossel
and $__timeFilter(time)
--GROUP BY mada.time , mada.value

select time, value as "qtdTinta"
from machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '$maquina'
and mada.sensor_type = '03'  -- and time between now() - INTERVAL '1 m' AND NOW() 
and $__timeFilter(time)
limit 1
--GROUP BY mada.time , mada.value

select time, value as "Tunel humidity"
from machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '$maquina'
and mada.sensor_type = '03' -- colocar sensor id da vel de carrossel
and $__timeFilter(time)
--GROUP BY mada.time , mada.value

libraryPanel.name: Amount of electric power consumption unidade

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(time, '1h'), 
  sum(mada.value) as "kWh" 
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mada.sensor_type = '16' and  mach.description = '$maquina' 
and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '12 HOURS' AND NOW()
and $__timeFilter("time")
GROUP by 1
ORDER BY time desc
limit 13

libraryPanel.name: Amount of cost of electrical consumption unidade

panels.title: Amount of cost of electrical consumption

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(time, '1h'), 
  sum(mada.value)* 0.677 as "Cost per hour" 
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mada.sensor_type = '16' and mach.description = '$maquina'
and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '12 HOURS' AND NOW()
and $__timeFilter("time")
GROUP by 1
ORDER BY time desc
limit 13

list.definition: select distinct (description) from machines where id in ('12') order by description
list.label: Machine
list.name: maquina
list.query: select distinct (description) from machines where id in ('12') order by description
